about_the_game:
Manor Mania is a Randomized Metroidvania game on a smaller scale with more focus on replayability. Explore a handcrafted map, find and equip Power Ups & Items to defeat the many enemies & bosses.

There are 7 unique Power Ups to discover, with each one unlocking different routes to explore throughout the manor. The randomized order of these Power Ups, alongside the random loot, will ensure that each run is quite varied.

There are 12 total equippable slots, which include a Main Weapon, a Ranged Weapon, 8 armor slots, and 2 Trinket slots(DAM & SYN). Items are randomly dropped from enemies, bosses, & chest, These include 7 Weapon varieties, each with its own evolved form, 8 different Armor sets, and 16 unique trinket items. All of these items can be equipped to make for powerful build "combos" to overcome the ever increasing odds.
